customer_reviews.title: I couldn't find something that was a better replacement, so I bought it again

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but should have went with the EJ bowl.
customer_reviews.text: Gotta be honest; big fan of EJ products, but this is just okay. I've been using a cooking bowl to lather up my Proraso shaving cream, and it worked good, but I wanted something more "classy". This EJ "bowl" is classy looking, but the cooking bowl is way more effective at getting up a good lather; it's just ergonomically easier to use when lathering up the cream. This EJ "bowl" is really just a flared cup with a handle. If you just like product identification, then the EJ bowl (silver colored) would probably work best, but I went for the "cool" looking black "bowl". Still a big fan of EJ, but just not this product.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shaving mug
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how easy it would be to use this mug because the handle isn't a typical loop on the side on the mug. I find it's much easier to use with the type of handle. I also like the large diameter of the lip of the mug. This is a huge improvement over the soap bowl I was using.
customer_reviews.author: K
